wikitext.*:
{{book | title=Tolkien Calendar 2001 | image = The Lord of the Rings Calendar 2001.jpg | illustrator=[[John Howe]] | publisher=[[HarperCollins]] | date=[[5 June]] [[2000]] | format=Calendar | pages=32 | noisbn=[[Special:BookSources/0-261-10379-2|0-261-10379-2]] (UK)
[[Special:BookSources/0-06-105852-1|0-06-105852-1]] (US) | precededby=[[Tolkien Calendar 2000]] | followedby=[[Tolkien Calendar 2002]] }} The '''''Tolkien Calendar 2001''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[HarperCollins]] on [[5 June]] [[2000]]. It features art by [[John Howe]] based on ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', and includes a free poster of the [[Battle of the Pelennor Fields|Battle of Pelennor Fields]]. ==From the publisher== {{blockquote|The 21st century’s first Tolkien Calendar features twelve newly commissioned paintings based on The Lord of the Rings by renowned Tolkien artist John Howe.

The Tolkien Calendar 2001 features 13 brand new paintings from John Howe, creator of the famous ‘Gandalf’ jacket and designer on the forthcoming Lord of the Rings Movie Trilogy . The paintings are all based on Tolkien’s classic masterpiece, The Lord of the Rings and the overall design of this year’s calendar features input from the artist himself.}} ==Illustrations== * January - "[[:File:John Howe - Black Riders in the Shire.jpg|Black Riders in The Shire]]" * February - "[[:File:John Howe - Gandalf Falls with the Balrog.jpg|Gandalf Falls With The Balrog]]" * March - "[[:File:John Howe - Horseman in the Night.jpg|Horseman in the Night]]" * April - "[[:File:John Howe - Gollum Flees the Elves of Mirkwood.jpg|Gollum Flees the Elves of Mirkwood]]" * May - "[[:File:John Howe - Gwaihir rescues Gandalf from Orthanc.jpg|Escape from Orthanc]]" * June - "[[:File:John Howe - The Argonath.jpg|The Argonath]]" * Centrefold - "[[:File:John Howe - The Siege of Gondor.jpg|The Siege of Gondor]]" * July - "[[:File:John Howe - The Bridge of Khazad-dum.jpg|The Bridge of Khazad-dûm]]" * August - "[[:File:John Howe - Legolas and Gimli at Helm's Deep.jpg|Legolas and Gimli]]" * September - "[[:File:John Howe - Shelob About to Leap on Frodo.jpg|Shelob About to Leap on Frodo]]" * October - "[[:File:John Howe - The End of All Things.jpg|The End of the Third Age]]" * November - "[[:File:John Howe - Zirak-zigil.jpg|Zirakzigil]]" * December - "[[:File:John Howe - The Grey Havens.jpg|The Grey Havens]]" ==Variants== File:Tolkien Calendar 2001 (Greek).jpg| '''''Τόλκιν Ημερολόγιο 2001'''''
